name: The Cursed Island
description:
This looks like a peaceful land, a paradise if you may. But don't let it fool your gaze. An evil spirit cursed this place. Pirates, looters and warriors came to steal treasures and gain fame, but the island is strong. Dangers, riddles and curses won. If you have an honest soul, and perhaps a heart that's brave, then what are you waiting for...try the island if you dare!

W,A,S,D to walk

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to aim

Mouse button to fire
